Kylian Mbappe's France are hot favourites
Jude Bellingham begins his campaign with England against Serbia
Cristiano Ronaldo gets his hands on a second European Championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: UEFA Euro 2024 kicks off in India in the early hours of June 15

Others: UEFA Euro 2024 sees Europe's 24 best teams fight it out from June 15
